#summary This page documents general information about the ICARUS Flyer.

= Introduction =

The ICARUS Flyer is a QuadTiltWing (QTW) UAV.  Unlike a TiltRotor, a TiltWing operates by tilting an airfoil along with a motor/propeller help generate lift and thrust along a desired flight path.


= Details =

The ICARUS Flyer features the following:
  * Tandem Wing
  * Independently rotating Winglets
  * DC Brushless Motors
  * Autonomous Navigation/Flight Stabilization System
